titles.title: Electing Members to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform
House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology

bill.summary: 1/18/2011--Passed House without amendment. Elects specified named Members to the following House Committees: (1) the Budget; (2) Education and the Workforce; (3) Foreign Affairs; (4) Homeland Security; (5) the Judiciary; (6) Natural Resources; (7) Oversight and Government Reform; (8) Science, Space, and Technology; (9) Small Business; and (10) Veterans' Affairs.
